description: A relationship of control between two companies

___source_jurisdiction.description: Jurisdiction of the source of the data

$eref.description: A company which is the subject of a statement

___identifier.description: An official identifier paired with a code for the issuer of the identifier, e.g sec/12345

___data.description: This is an array of data objects, that is the objects which actually contain the data about the datum. Generally there will only be one element in this, although in for some types of data_types there may naturally be several releated to the same company, e.g. shareholders

___company_number.description: Company number, if company and known

___significant.description: Does the source define the control as somehow significant?

___percentage_controlled.description: Percentage controlled, either directly or indirectly

___direct.description: If the control is direct (if via an intermediary, this value should be false; if unknown, left blank)
